General_Description: '''The Red Orders''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta]]'s [[Spartan army|military]] is nothing without its skilled tacticians."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed Spartan State [[Nation Leader|Leaders]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Spartan Heads]] and [[Spartan Heights]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
